comment.author: 81736808@N02
comment._content: This is tagged as Charlottetown but, by its caption, it's Halifax.  Citadel Hill in the foreground looking southeast to George's Island in Halifax Harbour and Dartmouth on the far shore.

comment._content: Thank you very much. Duly fixed.
